strapiPost.title: New Brewery Announces Plans For Location In East Fayetteville
strapiPost.content:
Fayetteville Beer Works has plans to open by this summer near the intersection of Mission and Crossover on the east side of town.

  • Homebrew: The brewery is the idea of local entrepreneur Brian O'Connell who helped found the Colorado-based Renegade Brewing Co in Denver.
  • New chill spot: O'Connell aims for Fayetteville Beer Works to be a family-friendly hang-out with a rotating menu of small-batch beers and hopes to find a partnering food truck to add to the experience.

Read more on the story in the Fayetteville Flyer HERE.
